title: Hour 2: Griner Update
description:
Freddie Coleman and Courtney Cronin are joined in this episode by Kendrick Perkins who gives his take on Kevin Durant's desire to divorce Kyrie and the Nets. Social justice advocate and commentator Angela Rye joins the show to give an update on Brittney Griner's trial in Russia as it began today. Also, the crew "puts a ring on it" as they debate whether Ja Morant or Nikola Jokic is closer to winning a championship.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Brittney Griner's trial begins today
